author: Aijaman Pirlo
message: When GUPTAS was chowing money with Zuma like nobodies business. Petrol was cheaper... BRING BACK GUPTAS Petrol iyadura bakithi Peit you lie Bring back GUPTAS and Zuma..Petrol was cheap under them..... Everthing is expensive these days yet we are still blaming other people. When you corrupt squandering money. You immidiately suffer because the money is not properly channelled. Whe we only suffer now They say petrol is expensive because of Zuma. Why it was not expensive that time because Zuma was corrupt with his friends including Nene. Why we only suffer now? Why now not at that time when Guptas were taking everything Rand lost value more than it was during the corruption of Guptas and Zuma. Why it never lost value that time? Auti irrespective of Zuma selling PetroSA strategic what what. Fact is Petrol was cheaper as compared to now. Why it was not expensive at that time? "I warn South Africans "Auti Mjita - I've been driving since I was 23 now I am 39. I can easily tell the difference on petrol price. Under Zuma This inquiry is just a smokescreen to play dirty politics. We won't benefit anything out of this nonsense Mark my words True Desmond Auti Mjita might think he is smart thinking that we will benefit something out of this nonsense. Mark my words. 2019 will come and go and nothing will have been done by that time Black people do not fly all the time. We use buses when we cross country. I do not care about SAA. I did not fly for 15 years yet black people are made to be so concerned about SAA and forget the major issues Not even a single Airbus which fall off the sky yet we so focused on it. Lets talk about Jobela buses and City to City buses and their standards because people die all the time on the road We are black lets be concerned about issues which hit the poorest. Some-1 in Alexandra doesn't even know where is OR Tambo in JHB but that person is made to worry about SAA not City City "Lets all come back here after this hearing and debate. Believe me uZuma uyityile imali uyityile. Akangowokuqala!!!! He did nothing just like the presidents before him. Just like Ramaphosa is doing now The widows of Marikana mine workers are yet to be paid anything till today. Now you say BFF is holding the payment yhoooo So BFF got powers of holding governments payments? hehehehehehe hay yhoooo "I am repeating I remember when Andries Tatane passed on. There was a commision. What happened after that commision? Nothing Auti Mjita - you think you smart as a result you don't look at reality. Mbeki squandered the FIFA money under the disguise of African diaspora. Mandela and his group of stellenbosch was corrupt Every president we once had was corrupt. De Klerk funded the killings in Boipatong and PolaPark..No commision ever established to look at these previous presidents but Zuma was corrupt just like them. There is commision. Why because 2019 is around the corner and this commision is just a smokescreen "Zwelethu - I promise you mfethu SAA new international route....mximmmmmmmmmm
